name: Sora Oracle
description: Sora delivers Decentralized Data Integrity and Real-Time Outcome Resolution for prediction markets on BNB Chain. Build with confidence using our permissionless, open-source oracle SDK. With Sora's oracle infrastructure, achieve instant bet settlements and multi-source data aggregation. Build prediction markets that scale without compromising on speed or accuracy. Sora Oracle is built for teams or users that want to build prediction markets with ease and helps integrate on the blockchain.
